body.p: The Interpretations Committee received feedback that first-time adopters of IFRS Standards may also find retrospective application burdensome. Consequently, the Interpretations Committee decided that first-time adopters should not be required to apply the Interpretation to assets, expenses and income initially recognised before the date of transition to IFRS Standards. Accordingly, this Interpretation amends IFRS 1 First-time Adoption of International Financial Reporting Standards.
